title: Add dedicated Clans section with clan lore and sigil images

requirements.text: Create a new page section with id="clans" and a visible section header titled "Clans" that contains the provided intro paragraph and the seven clan entries (Moon, Sun, Fire, Water, Lightning, Earth, Balance) with their exact provided descriptions.

quotes: make a section called clans and put this

acceptanceCriteria: A new section exists in the main page markup with id="clans" and a header reading "Clans".
The section includes the intro text: "Each clan wields unique elemental powers passed down through generations. Discover their strengths, their legends, and their role in the coming war."
The section renders seven clan blocks titled: Moon Clan, Sun Clan, Fire Clan, Water Clan, Lightning Clan, Earth Clan, Balance Clan.
Each clan block displays the exact corresponding description text from the user request (verbatim, including punctuation).

requirements.text: Add the new "Clans" section into the main page flow in frontend/src/App.tsx so it appears as its own standalone section (not nested inside the existing Worldbuilding section).
acceptanceCriteria: The Clans section is rendered as a sibling section alongside the other top-level sections in App.tsx.
The existing Worldbuilding section remains present and continues to render as before.

requirements.text: Update the top navigation (frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx) to include a "Clans" nav link that smooth-scrolls to the new section id="clans" on both desktop and mobile menus.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking "Clans" scrolls to the section with id="clans" with the same offset behavior as other links.
Mobile menu closes after selecting "Clans" (matching existing behavior).

requirements.text: Add sigil image rendering for each clan entry in the Clans section using generated static assets stored under frontend/public/assets/generated, with appropriate alt text (e.g., "Moon Clan sigil").
acceptanceCriteria: Each of the seven clan entries displays a sigil image loaded from /assets/generated/*.png.
Each sigil image includes non-empty alt text matching the pattern "<Clan Name> sigil" (e.g., "Balance Clan sigil").
The Clans section layout remains readable and responsive from mobile to desktop (no overflow or broken grid).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: No changes to the existing Worldbuilding section content or structure beyond adding a separate Clans section elsewhere on the page.
No implementation of quiz, character match system, or other new interactive features.

required: Moon Clan sigil, monochrome emblem with lunar crescent motif (moon-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
Sun Clan sigil, radiant emblem with sunburst and halo shapes (sun-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
Fire Clan sigil, emblem featuring flame/volcanic shapes and sharp angular marks (fire-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
Water Clan sigil, emblem featuring wave forms and flowing circular lines (water-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
Lightning Clan sigil, emblem featuring lightning bolt geometry and storm-like arcs (lightning-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
Earth Clan sigil, emblem featuring mountain/stone shapes with grounded symmetry (earth-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
Balance Clan sigil, emblem featuring intertwined elements in symmetrical harmony (balance-clan-sigil.dim_512x512.png)
